title: Earthfare
description: Family-owned store selling organic food and drink (vegetarian/vegan), non-pharma remedies and supplements, non-chemical body care products, natural baby and child products, eco-friendly household goods and loads of other stuff. They are constantly updating and adding more ethical and wholesome stocks. Fairtrade and organic cafe/deli takeaway at back of the shop offering coffees, teas, smoothies, juices, sandwiches/snacks, brownies, flapjacks, cheeses and more.
